example.text: This is such cheap talk. Mike Lawler is able to file a bill to expel George Santos but he won’t do it. Lawler is a part of the corrupt bargain to keep McCarthy as Speaker at all costs. He’ll never throw out Santos. [[url]]

Happy #InfrastructureWeek—from expanding rail to fixing roads to rebuilding bridges – thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, California has so many investments to look forward to over the next decade! ? ?
As part of the bill, I was able to secure over $15 million for 15 local projects in CA-15. These projects were made possible by strong local-federal partnerships.

This is such cheap talk. Mike Lawler is able to file a bill to expel George Santos but he won’t do it. Lawler is a part of the corrupt bargain to keep McCarthy as Speaker at all costs. He’ll never throw out Santos. [[url]]
Unrestricted gun violence is killing our communities and law enforcement. We need to address the real issues to protect our police. [[url]]
Thank you [[user]] for going to Ukraine and fighting for freedom. Their fight for freedom is our fight. #SlavaUkraini [[url]]
